h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: Sometimes this can be the key to unlocking hidden places and finding secret bosses. It’s also worth going back to NPCs and to previously visited shrine stores to see if they have new stock.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '9\. It Pays to Backtrack'.
The content is as follows:
Sometimes this can be the key to unlocking hidden places and finding secret bosses. It’s also worth going back to NPCs and to previously visited shrine stores to see if they have new stock.
